description:
This expansion offers you a unique opportunity to increase your profits and become a tycoon of maritime adventures, experiencing the taste of true wealth. In this ocean survival game, money doesn't solve everything, but it can make your voyage all the more exciting!
   Your career as an ocean fisherman will transform into a maritime business empire. Don't miss your chance to become a true tycoon of maritime adventures!
name: Deadliest Catch - DLC Pack
